# Mindefy

> Mindefy is a digital transformation and AI solutions company building custom AI, data, cloud, and software products for startups and enterprises.

Primary language: en
Base URL: https://mindefy.tech
Contact: https://mindefy.tech/#contact (email: rahul@mindefy.tech)
Last updated: 2026-02-11

## Company
- [Home](https://mindefy.tech/): Company overview, services, products, and contact.
- [About Mindefy](https://mindefy.tech/about-us-technology-innovators): Mission, values, and company background.
- [Customer Testimonials](https://mindefy.tech/customer-testimonials-reviews): Client reviews and feedback.
- [Site Map](https://mindefy.tech/site-map): Full list of pages.

## AI & Data
- [AI & ML Services](https://mindefy.tech/ai-ml-services): Overview of AI and ML offerings.
- [Custom AI Solutions for Enterprises](https://mindefy.tech/custom-ai-solutions-enterprises): Enterprise AI solutions and deployments.
- [Machine Learning Services](https://mindefy.tech/machine-learning-services): ML development services.
- [Custom Machine Learning Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/custom-machine-learning-solutions): Tailored ML solutions.
- [Generative AI & Chatbot Development](https://mindefy.tech/generative-ai-chatbot-development): GenAI and chatbot development.
- [Advanced Data Engineering Services](https://mindefy.tech/advanced-data-engineering-services): Data pipelines and analytics.

## Product & App Development
- [Web Application Development Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/web-application-development-solutions): Web product engineering.
- [Android App Development Experts](https://mindefy.tech/android-app-development-experts): Android development services.
- [iOS App Development Services](https://mindefy.tech/ios-app-development-services): iOS development services.
- [Hybrid App Development Services](https://mindefy.tech/hybrid-app-development-services): Cross-platform app development.
- [MVP Development & Startup Support](https://mindefy.tech/mvp-development-startup-support): MVP delivery and startup support.
- [Startup Support Consulting](https://mindefy.tech/startup-support-consulting): Startup advisory services.
- [Startup Incubation Consulting](https://mindefy.tech/startup-incubation-consulting-services): Incubation and growth support.
- [Low-Code App Development Services](https://mindefy.tech/low-code-app-development-services): Low-code delivery.
- [Agile & Rapid Development Practices](https://mindefy.tech/agile-rapid-development-practices): Agile delivery practices.
- [White Label Software Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/white-label-software-solutions): White-label product builds.
- [E-commerce Marketplace Development](https://mindefy.tech/ecommerce-marketplace-development): Marketplace platforms.
- [Mindful UX Design & User Experience](https://mindefy.tech/mindful-ux-design-user-experience): UX research and design.
- [Test Automation & QA Services](https://mindefy.tech/test-automation-qa-services): QA automation and testing.

## Cloud, DevOps & Architecture
- [Cloud Engineering Services](https://mindefy.tech/cloud-engineering-services): Cloud architecture and delivery.
- [Cloud DevOps Engineering](https://mindefy.tech/cloud-devops-engineering): DevOps, CI/CD, and operations.
- [Microservices Architecture Consulting](https://mindefy.tech/microservices-architecture-consulting): Microservices planning and implementation.

## Enterprise & Business Solutions
- [Digital Transformation Consulting](https://mindefy.tech/digital-transformation-consulting): Digital transformation strategy.
- [IT Consulting & Strategy](https://mindefy.tech/it-consulting-strategy): Technology strategy services.
- [Enterprise Software Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/enterprise-software-solutions): Enterprise application development.
- [Business Process Management Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/business-process-management-solutions): BPM consulting and implementation.
- [CRM Software Solutions](https://mindefy.tech/crm-software-solutions): CRM platforms and customization.
- [Staff Augmentation Services](https://mindefy.tech/staff-augmentation-services): Team extension and talent.

## Game & AR/VR
- [AR/VR Game Development](https://mindefy.tech/ar-vr-game-development): Immersive experience development.
- [Unity & Unreal Engine Development](https://mindefy.tech/unity-unreal-engine-development): Game engine development services.
- [Game Animation & Graphics](https://mindefy.tech/game-animation-graphics): Art, animation, and graphics.

- [Early Foods E-commerce](https://mindefy.tech/early-foods-e-commerce): E-commerce case study.
- [JEGO OTT Platform](https://mindefy.tech/jego-ott-platform): OTT platform case study.
- [GreenBill Paperless Billing](https://mindefy.tech/greenbill-paperless-billing-software): Paperless billing case study.

- [Mach One Platform Services](https://mindefy.tech/mach-one-platform-services): Platform services case study.
